What is Modest Resell?

Modest Resell is a social marketplace for new and secondhand fashion for women, men, and kids. Shop from thousands of people -- and start selling too!

How it works

Item Assessment

We empower our users by providing a platform where they can easily sell their pre-loved modest clothing and find unique pieces that resonate with their personal style and values

Upload

The seller takes pictures and uploads details about the clothing.

Verification

Modest Resell verifies the seller information and product listings.

Listing

Once approved, the item get listed on the marketplace

Sale

Buyers can purchase the listed item.

Shipping

The seller ships the item to the buyer.

Payment

Once the buyer receives the item and is satisfied, the payment is released to the seller.
